phrases: I had lost my way during my journey.
Only my soul was wandering, while I stood still.
But right now, I am walking to a distant place.
That is right, ever since I met you on this road.
The travellers witnessed the song, the forbidden song,
And I became attached to it as I heard it alone with you.
If the world I saw in my dreams exists somewhere,
Let us go search for it, beyond the winds.
Whether it is a freezing dawn,
A dry midday,
A shivering night,
or the ends of the Earth, let us go and see it.
How many did you eat?
Seventeen.
No, eighteen.
No, maybe nineteen?
And how much is left?
Forget about it.
It is just for reference.
You already know it.
Just in case, you see.
Eighty...
Eighty what?
Eighty-one!
I-I just have to eat them, right?
Right?
Are you even able to eat them all?
I can!
I am Horo the Wise from Yoitsu!
You do not need to be so obstinate.
Who is?
What is the truth?
It is the truth.
What is the real truth?
It is the real truth!
What is the real, real, real truth?
It is the real, real, real truth!
The truth is, I am already tired of them.
I would think so.
Even if they are your favorite food, you had twenty yesterday and almost as many today.
But...
But I will show you I can eat them all!
Well, do not get so worked up.
You may be tired of fresh apples, but there are several ways to eat them.
And what exactly are these severals ways to eat them?
D-Do not ridicule me!
I have never heard of apples being baked before!
You have seriously never eaten apple pie?
Such a thing really exists?
Yeah, you bake it in a pan with dough.
And if you do that, it becomes chewy...
This is not a good way of explaining it, but it is like it is slowly rotting.
But just like how something about to rot is good, baked apples are very good.
When you eat fresh apples, they moisten your dry throat.
But baked apples are so sweet that they make your throat dry.
But I am sure you are tired of sweet food.
So, we will have a change of pace for dinner and have salted meat or fish.
Which would you like?
Meat!
And who was it just now who looked like they could not eat any more?
It is a different story if it is meat.
Come on!
I am really counting on you with the apples.
Do not worry.
I have confidence I can eat them all after hearing your story!
Well, I have some business too, so let us go.
Yeah!
I changed the mood so that you would not get tired of me, either.
You are inedible.
Did you want me to say that I am delicious?
Yeah.
Wolf and Blessed Tail
Ah, well...
Ah, it is that.
How should I say it?
You...
You really do look like a nun, though.
Right, it is convenient for traveling, is not it?
I guess.
People are as strange as ever, being so particular
about whether to wear all these different clothes or not.
There are times when it is convenient for wolves to wear sheep's clothing too, right?
You are right.
If I wore rabbit's fur, I am sure you would fall into my trap instantly.
In that case, I will carry around some apples so that I will get caught in a trap.
I even forgot about apples as well.
And so!
In your case, you look too much like a nun, so there are times when it would be inconvenient.
Like when?
No matter how much a nun may have fallen, they would not drink beer in the middle of the day.
I am quite the nun, then.
A nun would not say that either.
Well, excuse me, sir.
Seriously though, there will be places where dressing as a nun would be a bad idea once we head north.
So what should we do?
So, ah...
Well, it would be a safe idea for you to have a set of clothes like a city girl's.
Let us go and buy some before we eat, then.
If we are held back by business, our meal will not be as good.
Th-Thank you, I did not have to waste time explaining.
Were you thinking I would say we should eat and drink first?
I will not get distracted by food that easily!
I wonder about that.
I was being considerate for you, and you bought it so easily.
You came up with such an exaggerated reason just to buy a set of clothes.
Did you think I would not notice?
Well, I will hold back and let you buy me some clothes.
It is going to be a cold, cold winter, after all.
You can hold back a little more, you know.
Wh-What is wrong?
I have no money.
You...
No, that is not what I meant.
I am saying I do not have small change.
Better too big than too small, as they say.
So you just need to use that money.
There is also the saying about cutting a rabbit with a meat cleaver.
If I used this money at a clothes store, I cannot imagine how displeased they would be.
I see.
But are gold coins really worth so much?
Of course.
For example, the current Rumione gold coin is worth thirty-five Thoreni silver coins.
If you live humbly, one silver coin can last you seven days.
And it is worth thirty-five times that.
That is quite something.
However!
The store said that these clothes are worth two gold coins.
Unlike apples, would not clothes be something you would buy with gold coins?
If that were true, most of the people in the city would be naked.
I am sure the merchant who sold those clothes must have been quite worried about if you would even pay.
Were these that expensive?
Of course.
So choose some shabby-looking clothes when we buy them.
I am Horo the Wise from Yoitsu!
If I wear something shabby, it will hurt my pride!
They say that if you are truly beautiful, then anything should look good on you.
But still, to the money exchange, huh?
Oh, we are going to exchange money?
Then we are going to that bridge, right?
Hey, come on!
Hurry up and walk.
I want to drink some beer soon.
Rumione, you say?
Today's market price for it is thirty-four Thoreni silver coins on the dot.
And the handling charge?
Ten Liuto coins, or thirty Trie coins.
I will pay in Liuto coins.
Understood.
Well then...
Oh, please be careful.
If you drop them, they will belong to whoever picks it up off the street.
Weiz.
What?
I am the customer.
Leave the gold coin there, I am busy right now.
Even though you are not even treating your precious customers properly?
Of course!
It is more important that this precious little lady does not drop any coins.
Is not that right?
My, that makes me happy.
But, dear sir.
What is it?
There are just too many coins for my hand to hold.
That is why my hand is there, Horo.
My, but we cannot do this.
You will not be able to use your precious hands.
Not at all, I will gladly use my hands so that these coins will not fall from your hands.
It does not trouble me in any way.
That is because you are like a warm feeling in my chest that cannot be held with both arms,
and there is no doubt that you will accept it all!
Weiz!
Did you forget the basics of being a money exchanger?
Silver in a bag, gold in a chest.
You should be holding on to crude copper coins in your hands!
Geez.
Keeping such a good girl to yourself is an act against God.
Have not you heard the passage that says to share what bread you can offer?
You want me to share?
I will not share with you on top of the money exchanging fee, though.
I either give you everything or nothing.
If that happens, then she will come with the debt she owes me.
So, I believe that you need to show some level of determination.
I cannot possibly place a price on you!
Just how can you say that, you corrupt merchant!
The scale in my heart is tilting back and forth right now.
But please, believe that it is not tilting because of the weight of gold coins.
Of course!
Of course I believe you.
You really are a bad person, to touch a tilting scale with your hands.
Horo...
Come on, let us get going.
H-Hey, Lawrence.
You came to exchange some gold coins, so are you going shopping or something?
That is right.
Prices seem like they are going to rise.
Since that is the case, the faster, the better.
Bye for now.
Do money exchangers even work when the sun sets?
No, it is a rule that money exchangers who use scales after the sun sets are swindlers!
And of course, I am no swindler.
That is what he said.
Once I buy clothes, I will be going to the tavern early.
You can come if you want when you are done working.
Of course, my brother!
It is the usual tavern, right?
It is scary to be drunk at a tavern I do not know.
All right!
It will be soon!
I will really be there soon!
It was as interesting as I thought.
It will be troublesome later if you get him too serious.
Troublesome?
He will follow you.
You are already following me.
I played around knowing that, unlike you two.
It is fun teasing you,
but I want to play with some smart males sometimes.
You both knew I was playing, though.
So could you not act so serious?
I will start blushing instead, you know.
Well, that Weiz fellow is more of an eloquent talker than you, though.
I have lived for a long time,
but I have never met anyone like him, whose words I cannot trust at all.
I am sure you, who lives in the business world, would understand this, right?
Yeah.
If it were beneficial for me, I would lie as much as needed.
It will not work on me, though.
All right, let us go shopping for clothes.
Hey!
You have missed your chance two times to grasp the blessing God granted.
If you do not grasp it next time, the tail of blessing might run away.
Hey, what do you mean?
Hey, Horo!
Wait for me!
That one right there is forty Liuto.
It is quite durable for that price.
I am heading north, so could you find something that is cheap and warm for the two us?
What is your budget?
Two Thoreni coins.
Please leave it to me.
A set of robes, two blankets...
And would something like this be fine?
Let us see...
Just as you can see, I am a merchant.
On my travels, I became friends with the Milone Company here.
Oh?
With Mr. Milone?
Right, so that is why I may come several times a year from now on.
Oh, is that so?
Then let me add another blanket along with this robe.
Of course, they have been smoked,
so I guarantee that they will repel bugs for two years.
Did not we come to buy clothes for me?
That is right.
Are you telling me to wear that?
If you can get away from the cold with just that robe, then it should be okay.
If you are angry because I used your enemy, then say so.
I am Horo the Wise.
I am smart and I have a good business sense, but my nose is sharp too!
The day I wear that, my nose will turn up!
I thought having you suffer a bit might fix that twisted personality of yours.
Do not get angry.
I will let you in on the secret later.
Excuse me, sir.
Yes.
Do you have any nice clothes for women?
Clothes for women?
Something that will not because much trouble in northern cities,
something about her size.
Very well, please wait a moment.
How about this?
It is a court attendant's dress that was bought from a certain store, though.
I do not want something that gaudy.
It does not suit you?
I want something simpler and easy to change into.
Then...
Sir, how about that?
Yes?
I see!
You are quite the person, to have laid your eyes on this.
These articles were once worn by a certain noble.
Just look, the seams are sewn neatly, and it will not tear so easily.
What you should really be looking at is this walnut-colored cap.
Once you wear this over your shoulder,
and wear this specially tailored triangular cap just like the servants at this noble's house,
you will become a city girl immediately!
A rabbit?
Does not it make you want to eat it?
I like this!
How much is it?
For the two of them, let us see...
Ten Thoreni coins.
No, how about nine coins?
Very well.
In deference to the beautiful lady here, I will make it eight coins.
Well, then...
How about someone cute, such as myself, were to wear these to open your heart?
Would you make it seven coins?
V-Very well, I will let you have it for seven coins.
Thank you.
Excuse me then.
What do you think?
Wonderful!
One Thoreni coin is not even enough for this!
Were these clothes too expensive?
No, seven coins for those is quite good.
You still had enough confidence to drive the price down?
If I had gotten similar clothes like the ones you are carrying over your shoulder,
I thought it would have been okay for being a tenth of these.
Yeah.
I actually thought it would have cost more, so do not worry.
Okay.
As long as you hold back on drinking later,
you will make up for the seven coins right away.
I will not drink that much!
But still, the way you forcefully bargained with him was really cheap.
No matter how great a merchant may be, they would not be able to stand up to that.
All males are idiots, after all.
What are you going to do with that?
Take it with you to the tavern?
No, not at all.
But the inn is not this way.
Yeah, I will not be leaving it at the inn either.
I am going to sell these at a different clothes shop.
We can buy some clothes for the cold when we head a bit more north.
You are going to sell them?
There is no point in keeping them if we are not going to use them, right?
That is true, but will they sell high?
I am not sure.
Gaining a profit would be difficult.
I will probably have a bit of a loss.
You are still going to sell them if you have a loss?
You do not understand why?
Hold on, I am thinking now.
Shall I tell you the secret?
I will not ask you to tell me!
But if you want to say it, then go ahead.
Still, it is nothing great, and you were more amazing back there.
This bunch of clothes is worth two coins.
For example, let us say we sell these at a different store for half the price.
I would have a loss of one coin.
Right.
But, let us think of it a different way.
A different way?
Yes, everyone would think that the robe you are wearing is high-grade, right?
Robe...
It is safe to say that a person wearing that would not ever go to a shop like that.
That is why that shop keeper actually wanted to have a good relation with me, who brought you.
Now then, if it were you, what would you do?
I would sell things cheap to leave a good impression.
That is right.
And what would lead from that?
That store lost a bit off these.
And they lost quite a bit off yours.
We bought these near-ragged clothes for two coins.
However, there is a huge gap between the two prices.
And what would lead from that?
If we think about the difference, there is a huge profit gained.
Well done.
What a cheap trick.
A completely cheap trick!
That trick?
Fool!
I am amazed you even thought of that.
That is called business sense.
But yours beat mine.
Naturally.
Your shallow thinking cannot beat my planning.
You said it now.
You think you can win?
Well, if you are confident about it,
maybe you could show me your skills when we go drinking.
When we go drinking?
Could you buy me at a high price?
Sure, I will buy you.
But the payment will be in apples.
You are pretty tough too.
If you bake me, I might become a bit sweeter.
You are pretty well baked already.
I cannot eat a baked male that is too sweet.
What about you, then?
Do you want to have a bite and see for yourself?
I will think about it.
You grasped it properly the third time.
Seven apples on the witch's tree
With seven seeds to plant inside of me
In spring time I grew a magic song
Then skipping along,
I sang the song to everyone
I look at the world through apple eyes
And cut myself a slice of sunshine pie
I danced with the peanuts for the flies
Till someone had told me
To say hello for every good-bye
Saw some sugar stars
I will put them in a jar
And we will wish around the world
Oh we will wish around the world
I am a little wolf inside a cart
You say,
And off I go from June to May
Oh we will wish around the world
Let us wish around the world
Next, Wolf and Righteous Scale
Next, Wolf and Righteous Scale
